titleStmt.title: Considerations tending to the happy accomplishment of Englands reformation in church and state. Humbly presented to the piety and wisdome of the High and Honourable Court of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Hartlib, Samuel, d. 1662.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication from Wing; publication date from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
